entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers and risk of a thunderstorm. High 19. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this evening and risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High 22. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Thursday 11 May 2023
